title: 128: Activating Your Brain for a Rich Life with Ramit Sethi
description:
How can you learn to be rich? What does your rich life look like?

All the treasures in our lives come from the quality of our mind. The habits of our thoughts and behavior determine what kind of life we’re going to be creating.

I’m excited to have our guest today to have this conversation because this is a topic that’s on a lot of people’s minds.

Ramit Sethi is the author of the New York Times bestseller 'I Will Teach You to Be Rich,' and his website (which has the same name as his book) helped creative professionals deal with clients and covers issues of psychology, personal finance and careers. He has been dubbed the “new finance guru on the block” by Fortune Magazine, as well as becoming a regular contributor to ABC, PBS and writing for the New York Times. 

In this episode, we will go over how you can change your mental script about money and build wealth without cutting out the things you love.

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
